Package citadelles.bots

Class Bot

java.lang.Object
citadelles.bots.Bot
Direct Known Subclasses:
MediumBot, SmartBot, StupidBot
public class Bot extends Object
The class above the other bots containing the methods useful for the proper functioning of the bots

      Parameters:

    • chooseAddCard

      public void chooseAddCard()
      Add card to the hand of the bot, but check before if he has the "Observatory" or the "Library" district placed that change the way of getting card. If the bot has the Observatory, he will choose 1 card among 3. If the bot has the Library, he will pick 2 card. If he has both the Observatory and the Library, he will act like he has only the Observatory. If he has neither the Observatory nor the Library, he will choose 1 card among 2.

    • chooseOneCard

      public District chooseOneCard(ArrayList<District> districtsPicked)
      Choose one district in a list
      Parameters:
      districtsPicked - The arraylist containing the different districts proposed to the bot
      Returns:
      An object District, the chosen one NB: overridden by the current bot

    • chooseAddGold

      void chooseAddGold()
      If the bot chose to get gold instead of card, 2 gold will be added to his wallet
